title: Why are certain traffic lights downtown (4th and Princess, 5th and Chestnut, that area) set in such a way that you frequently have to wait several minutes for them to change, despite the fact that there\'s no visible traffic, and rarely is for that matter? Are they defective? Is it deliberate? They\'re some of the longest traffic lights I\'ve ever seen. It\'s a real inconvenience sometimes.
